ui.presetManager.model.SequenceElement.ability(String): A static factory method for creating a `SequenceElement` of type `ABILITY`. It takes the ability's key (its unique name) as its value. This is the primary way that the `SequenceVisualService` creates elements that represent a concrete ability in the sequence.
ui.presetManager.model.SequenceElement.arrow(): A static factory method for creating a `SequenceElement` of type `ARROW`. It uses the Unicode arrow 'â†’' as its value. These elements are used to visually separate sequential steps in the UI.
ui.presetManager.model.SequenceElement.plus(): A static factory method for creating a `SequenceElement` of type `PLUS`. It uses the '+' symbol as its value. These elements visually separate abilities that should be used simultaneously (an 'AND' condition).
ui.presetManager.model.SequenceElement.slash(): A static factory method for creating a `SequenceElement` of type `SLASH`. It uses the '/' symbol as its value. These elements visually separate abilities that can be used interchangeably (an 'OR' condition).
